suncertify.services
Interface LocalURLyBirdServices

All Superinterfaces:
URLyBirdServices
All Known Implementing Classes:
URLyBirdLocalImpl
public interface LocalURLyBirdServices
extends URLyBirdServices

The Local Interface which contains all URLyBird Services that can be accessed from a within the program when accessed

Author:
Segun

Method Detail

createRoom

int createRoom(java.lang.String[] data)
               throws DuplicateKeyException
Handles room to be created in the database

Parameters:
data - - String array that contains the room data to be created which each element of the array represent the database structure field as expected
Returns:
- an Integer value of the row number of which new room data was created
Throws:
DuplicateKeyException - - if data argument unique key exists in the database

bookRoom

void bookRoom(int recNo,
              long ownerId)
              throws RecordNotFoundException,
                     java.lang.SecurityException,
                     InvalidFieldLengthException,
                     RoomAlreadyBookedException
Handles booking a room passing the unique record number to be booked

Parameters:
recNo - - an Integer value of the record number which the client connected to the server request to be booked
ownerId - - a long value of the client id who this room is gonna be booked to
Throws:
RecordNotFoundException - - if data was previously deleted in the record or doesn't exist
java.lang.SecurityException - - if the record is locked with a cookie other than lockCookie passed into the parameter
InvalidFieldLengthException - - If the argument String value length exceeds the required length
RoomAlreadyBookedException - - if the room was previously booked by this thread or another

deleteRoom

void deleteRoom(int recNo)
                throws RecordNotFoundException,
                       java.lang.SecurityException
This function deletes a room record from the database .. passing the unique record number to be deleted

Parameters:
recNo - - an Integer value of the record number to be deleted
Throws:
RecordNotFoundException - - if data was previously deleted in the record or doesn't exist
java.lang.SecurityException - - if the record is locked with a cookie other than lockCookie passed into the parameter

searchRecords

java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,URLyBirdHotel> searchRecords(java.lang.String[] creteria)
                                                             throws RecordNotFoundException
Searched the record that matched the unique criteria passed into the function argument, URLyBirdHotel object of matched data are returned with there respective row number as there key in a Map data collection

Parameters:
creteria - - array of string with 2 sizes, first element matching the Hotel Name and second element matched the Location
Returns:
- Map object of matched URLyBirdHotel object value with there row number returned respectively as the map key
Throws:
RecordNotFoundException - - if data was previously deleted in the record or doesn't exist

backupData

void backupData()
                throws URLyBirdException
This function is called to backup (Store the data cookie stored in the Map into the database file) in respect of values the Map contains

Throws:
URLyBirdException - when an unexpected error occurs when writing the data value back to the database file
